snippet: A game of hypotheticals with the other side of the gun debate finds logic, friendliness and a reality driven by fear.
abstract: Lawrence Downes Editorial Observer describes spending two days with National Rifle Assn-certified firearms instructor Robert Boilard in Manchester, NH, and engaging in debate about gun control; concludes he does not share fears of men like Boilard, who are clearly not as perturbed by use of guns as he is.
lead_paragraph: A game of hypotheticals with the other side of the gun debate finds logic, friendliness and a reality driven by fear.

headline.print_headline: Guns and Rights in New Hampshire
headline.main: Reaching Across the Gun Divide in New Hampshire
